Title: Greg the Babysitter
Writer: Lamar Abrams, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story by), Ben Levin (story by), Rebecca Sugar (story by), Ian Jones-Quartey (story by), Kat Morris (story by), Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)

Plot: Past-Greg visits an old friend and gets a taste of the responsibility to come.
